content: > this easy-to-make scarf hat can be stitched as shown or in your favorite color combinations skill level easy stitch gauge 14 sts 2 repeats = 3½ 8 89 cm 6 row = 4 in pattern red heart® soft yarn 1 ball each no 3720 lavender ca no 2541 blue sky cb and no 4601 off white cc pdf contains instructions for both the hat and the scarf a copy of this pattern is also available on the purplekittyyarns com website 1 1 http //www purplekittyyarns com/crochet-hat-patternsae html
